definition: any of numerous elongate mostly marine carnivorous fishes with heterocercal caudal fins and tough skin covered with small toothlike scales, hunt shark
details:
noun
- any of numerous elongate mostly marine carnivorous fishes with heterocercal caudal fins and tough skin covered with small toothlike scales
- a person who is unusually skilled in certain ways
= example: a person who is unusually skilled in certain ways
- a person who is ruthless and greedy and dishonest
verb
- hunt shark
- play the shark
